text: Universidad del Desarrollo (Spanish for "University for development") is a private university in Chile. It has three campuses in Concepción and 3 other campuseses in Santiago de Chile. The school has about 10,000 students. == History == The univerity was founded in 1990 by some Chilean economists. == Faculties == * Architecture and Art * Journalism * Law * Design * Business and Economy * Humanities and Education * Political Sciences * Engineering * Medicine * Psychology == Other websites == * Universidad del Desarrollo official website Category:Private Chilean universities Category:Colleges and universities in Santiago, Chile Category:1990 establishments in Chile Category:Colleges and universities in Concepción
title: University for Development
